content: **find this pattern for free on tlycblog com click here 1 ** **about the toasted marshmallow infinity** get back to basics by crocheting this easy textured infinity scarf the toasted marshmallow infinity works up quickly with super bulky weight yarn and q hook try some advanced level finishing techniques to make this project look effortlessly polished perfect for beginners and use the step-by-step video tutorial if you need it **pattern highlights** * beginner friendly infinity scarf * perfect for craft shows or last minute holiday and birthday gifts * substitute any other super bulky weight yarn or hold two strands of bulky weight yarn together // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns ================== 1 http //tlycblog com/toasted-marshmallow-infinity-scarf-free-crochet-pattern/
